mapper.select: select round(avg( temperature )) as temperature , round(avg( humidity )) as humidity , round(avg( fineDust )) as fineDust , DATE_FORMAT(createdDate, '%Y%m') createdDate from dailyCondition where createdDate >= '2017-01-01' and createdDate <= '2017-07-31' group by DATE_FORMAT(createdDate, '%Y%m') order by 4;
select seq , temperature , humidity , user , operation , createdDate from cardData order by 1 desc limit 1;
